name: Hexa Block Quest
description:
From easy to hard, a variety of puzzles are available with unique answers for each level.

[How to play]
Move blocks of a given shape into an empty space.
Fill the block with no spaces to complete the stage.
Use hints when you are in trouble!

[Features]
- Hexagonal puzzles to stimulate your brain
- A fun game with simple and easy rules
- Over 2000 different levels are offered free of charge.
- can play even without internet!
- can play even in AIRPLANE mode!
- game file is as low as 25M, light-weight download!
- supports tablet screen
- supports 14 languages


Homepage:
